answers.author: Paul Leistner
answers.text:
In Portland, Oregon, the Portland Public School District (PPS) allows formal neighborhood associations to meet in school facilities for free (with some restrictions). I've attached the letter from PPS that established the policy.

author: Kathleen Margoles
text: Does anyone have a policy governing use of facilities by community groups at no charge?
title: Community use of facilities at no charge
